problem.p: Two balls of different mass, starting from rest, slide down two identical frictionless tracks of the same vertical height, and then reach the bottom. Which of the following quantities is/are same for these two processes?

choice.name: foil1
choice.p: The work done by the earth

choice.name: foil2
choice.p: The change in the balls' kinetic energy

choice.name: foil13
choice.p: The change in the balls' speed

choice.name: foil1\4
choice.p: The change in the balls' kinetic energy & the change of the balls' speed

choice.name: foil5
choice.p: The change in the balls' kinetic energy & the work done by the earth

choice.name: foil6
choice.p: The change in the balls' speed & the work done by the earth
